sentence.Network_en: The document expressed some ambivalence over the doctrine of predestination.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份文献显示出对宿命论的某些矛盾观点.

sentence.Network_en: See how powerless is the human will against predestination!
sentence.Network_cn: 请看人类反抗命运的意志是多么脆弱无力啊!

sentence.Network_en: Grant's survey of financial history captured his crusty theory of economic predestination.
sentence.Network_cn: 格兰特对金融历史的考察使他产生了经济宿命论的激进理论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 预定论 (Predestination) 是加尔文主义的核心, 其五个教义的英文首字字母的组合成为Tulip，也称为“郁金香”教义。 1． 完全堕落（Tota…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from ecclesiastical Latin praedestinatio(n-), from praedestinare 'make firm beforehand' (see predestinate)

entry.def: If you believe in predestination, you believe that people have no control over events because everything has already been decided by a power such as God or fate.

means.word_mean: 1. previous determination as if by destiny or fate

2. (theology) being determined in advance; especially the doctrine (usually associated with Calvin) that God has foreordained every event throughout eternity (including the final salvation of mankind)

auth_sentence.content: He reduces predestination to God's foreknowledge of human determination.
auth_sentence.res_content: He reduces predestination to God's foreknowledge of human determination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He reduces predestination to God's foreknowledge of human determination.

auth_sentence.content: There is no original sin and no predestination in Mormonism.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no original sin and no predestination in Mormonism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no original sin and no predestination in Mormonism.

auth_sentence.content: This is called a predestination paradox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is called a predestination paradox.

pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
